nodes.bodyText: An IT should be implemented for this change in case a test for the old logic didn't exist
doc?
I think is not need to do this test, it is test with the others test
where are these be using?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -500,12 +502,23 @@ cache.contentletcache.chain =com.dotmarketing.business.cache.provider.caffine.Ca
 ## the velocity macros to disk, otherwise, they might not reload on restarts. 
 cache.velocitycache.chain   =com.dotmarketing.business.cache.provider.caffine.CaffineCache,com.dotmarketing.business.cache.provider.h22.H22Cache
 cache.velocitymacrocache.chain   =com.dotmarketing.business.cache.provider.caffine.CaffineCache,com.dotmarketing.business.cache.provider.h22.H22Cache
+
+## Cache API Token lookups for a hour (invalidations still apply)
 cache.apitokencache.chain=com.dotmarketing.business.cache.provider.timedcache.TimedCacheProvider
+cache.apitokencache.seconds=3600
+
+## Cache Elasticsearch Queries for 10 seconds - only applies to live queries
+cache.esquerycache.chain=com.dotmarketing.business.cache.provider.timedcache.TimedCacheProvider
+cache.esquerycache.seconds=10
+cache.esquerycache.size=10000

nodes.bodyText: This is how our caching layer works - each group can be configured individually and can use different caching strategies

@@ -500,12 +502,23 @@ cache.contentletcache.chain =com.dotmarketing.business.cache.provider.caffine.Ca
 ## the velocity macros to disk, otherwise, they might not reload on restarts. 
 cache.velocitycache.chain   =com.dotmarketing.business.cache.provider.caffine.CaffineCache,com.dotmarketing.business.cache.provider.h22.H22Cache
 cache.velocitymacrocache.chain   =com.dotmarketing.business.cache.provider.caffine.CaffineCache,com.dotmarketing.business.cache.provider.h22.H22Cache
+
+## Cache API Token lookups for a hour (invalidations still apply)
 cache.apitokencache.chain=com.dotmarketing.business.cache.provider.timedcache.TimedCacheProvider
+cache.apitokencache.seconds=3600
+
+## Cache Elasticsearch Queries for 10 seconds - only applies to live queries
+cache.esquerycache.chain=com.dotmarketing.business.cache.provider.timedcache.TimedCacheProvider
+cache.esquerycache.seconds=10
+cache.esquerycache.size=10000

nodes.bodyText:
maybe we can do a test where sleep the main thread for:
https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/18243/files#diff-9eef290d7e7caa46fa38e7f59dfe65cdR512
and test that the value was clean
maybe we can do a test to this: https://github.com/dotCMS/core/pull/18243/files#diff-9eef290d7e7caa46fa38e7f59dfe65cdR512
That is testing something else - the TimedCacheProvider
I think we don't have test to prove the cache is used here, maybe we can do a unit test mocking the RestHighLevelClientProvider  instance and verify that the search method is not call
@wezell is the uuid stuff required yet?
why do you need to clear cache here?
